plot: Directed by Vincent Fang (best known for his collaboration with Jay Chou), Rhythm of the Rain tells the story of youthful dreams, love and cultural differences.
title: Ting jian xia yu de sheng yin
plot_es: Directed by Vincent Fang (best known for his collaboration with Jay Chou), Rhythm of the Rain tells the story of youthful dreams, love and cultural differences.
original_name: Ting jian xia yu de sheng yin
